name: tortious
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
being or relating to a tort (= an action that is wrong, but can be dealt with in a civil court rather than a criminal court): The company's conduct was not only outrageous but also tortious. They were attempting to sue one of their competitors for tortious interference.
More examplesFewer examplesThe agreement was both illegal and tortious.As an employer, you are liable for any tortious act committed by an employee under your instruction.They are suing us for legal malpractice and tortious interference with a contract.
